
#include<string.h>
 #include<iostream>
 using namespace std;

 int main()
 {
     std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
     long t;
     cin>>t;
     while(t!=0) {
        char ch[300];
        cin>>ch;
        for(int j=0;j<t;j++){
            long pot=j;
            while(pot<strlen(ch)){
              cout<<ch[pot];
              pot+=2*t-(2*j+1);
              if(pot<strlen(ch))
              cout<<ch[pot];
              pot+=2*j+1;
            }
        }
        cout<<"\n";
        cin>>t;


     }

     return 0;

 }
